name: Misdreavus

evolution.description: Misdreavus can evolve into Mismagius at level 10 and above with the help of a Dusk Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Screech Pokémon. Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The Pokémon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.
